EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo Activation: 30 Minutes to Health
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're 30 Minutes to Health. Activate Now. <"http://go.vmturbo.com/new-cloud-edition-license.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=trialnurture>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
VMTurbo Operations Manager is the most sophisticated virtualization management software available, but don't just take our word for it. Take theirs:
<http://youtu.be/qUv3ZzOZyCY>
You’re halfway to the promised land of complete environment automation. In 30 minutes, our solution installs on any hypervisor and assures application performance while utilizing the resources of the environment as efficiently as possible. Activate your free trial (or re-download if you were delete-happy the first time), and see why VMTurbo is the trusted solution of more than 500 world-class enterprises. In good health, VMTurbo
Need help? Contact Sales at (877) 978 8818.
